fields.title: Learn to play camps
fields.description:
The initiative aims to make sports facilities accessible to junta in a way that anyone who wishes to
learn any sport can learn it during their stay on campus.

fields.title: Reviving Sports Consumables Budget for hostels
fields.agendaCategory: Availability of Sports Goods for Junta
fields.description:
To develop the sports culture of the institute it is necessary for consumables to be available to the
junta at the hostel level.

fields.title: Sports Alumni Fund
fields.description:
Alumni funding is one of the most undeveloped part of IIT Guwahati and with the growing costs of
various facilities it has become extremely important.

fields.title: Extension of slots for all sports
fields.description:
A lot of students miss out on playing because time slots for junta are over by the time the get free
from their academic responsibilities especially PHD scholars

fields.title: Organizing of workshops on Fitness Activities like Zumba from professionals for Junta
fields.description:
Sports can act as a great stress buster for the junta, for this purpose I would like to organize
workshops on fitness activities like Zumba, aerobics.

fields.title: Sports Equipment Inventory for Junta
fields.agendaCategory: Availability of Sports Goods for Junta
fields.description: Quality Equipment are necessary for every sport and to best utilize our sports Infrastructure.

fields.title: Hall of Fame
fields.description: Installation of Hall of Fame for all sports in the Old Sac

fields.title: Formation of InterIIT Student’s Organizing Committee
fields.description:
InterIIT Sports meet is a huge event and on the occasion of Institute’s 25th Anniversary its successful
and grand organization is a matter of pride for the institute.

fields.title: Marketing of InterIIT Sports Meet
fields.description:
A lot of money from the Institute Budget would be hosting of InterIIT which could be used directly for
betterment of Junta

fields.title: Construction of new Squash Courts
fields.description:
Presently Institute has only one squash court therefore it becomes extremely difficult to incorporate
both InterIIT sessions, NSO and other players.

fields.title: Construction of Indoor Basketball and Volleyball Courts:
fields.description:
Basketball and Volleyball courts are severely affected by rains, this affects the InterIIT sessions and
also the other players in general

fields.title: Sports Goods Stock Website
fields.description:
Availability of sports goods is one of the major concerns for budding sports enthusiasts also sports
board purchases a lot of sports equipment each year and it is the right of junta to know where that equipment
being used.

fields.title: Conduction of Inter-Department Leagues
fields.description:
Inter-Departmental Leagues to be conducted to increase the involvement of PG students in sports
and also increase student faculty Interaction on campus.
Plan of Action: Coordinating with department through department wise associations, approval for necessary
budget for referees and refreshment for participants.

fields.title: Appointment of Coaches for IITG Contingent
fields.description:
Winning in InterIIT matches is important to everyone to ensure this it is necessary that IITG
contingent get the best training, which many teams lack presently.

fields.title: Special Diet for IITG Contingent After Spirit
fields.description: Proper nutrition of players is necessary for improvement of performance of institute in InterIITs.

fields.title: Organizing of Practice Matches for IITG Contingent
fields.description:
Experience of playing competitive matches by teams is necessary for improvement of performance of
institute in InterIITs.

fields.title: IIT Guwahati Contingent Website
fields.agendaCategory: Motivation and Appreciation on IITG Contingent
fields.description:
Performance of IITG Contingent is a matter of pride to everyone, but there is still need to increase
enthusiasm among students to become a part of IITG Contingent
Possible Solution: Building of a website to showcase the InterIIT Contingents of IIT Guwahati.
